attributes.title: Led to Covid Outbreak
attributes.review: No one wore a mask just like our president Donald Trump, and everyone, though “social distancing” hung out and now there is a HUGE outbreak of Covid cases. All from the info on this app. We were told we didn’t have to wear one...if someone dies it’s on YOUR hands!!!!!!

attributes.title: My review
attributes.review: It’s not specific enough and overall trump is a terrible president....he’s racist,sexist, homophobic etc.. ALSO FREE BARRON 2020 you can clearly tell he don’t want no parts with his racist father.. having this app up is like having a white supremacy app up

attributes.title: My eyes
attributes.review: I had downloaded this app but it took 15 days to download which made me very upset but once I opened the app the first thing that had popped up was trumps nudes I am appalled at what I have seen and I will be deleting this app 🍊🦐

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app took a month to download and it had bugs and viruses that went into my phone. I was going to vote but all I can do on my phone is write a review because I have to get this virus out my phone now DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT WILL GIVE YOUR PHONE A VIRUS

attributes.title: Why this app should be taken down!!
attributes.review: This app took a long time to download and is honestly the WORST APP in the App Store! And I don’t say that often, so I mean it. It had me wait like 4 days to go on the app. This app probably has a virus.

attributes.title: Why would they make this
attributes.review: It is super buggy, it keeps crashing, the app won’t allow you to click certain thing if it’s a Tuesday.

attributes.title: absolutely horrible
attributes.review:
As i was trying to use the app it kept kicking me out. It also keeps glitching and it won’t allow me to delete it. I would NOT recommend 

Karen

attributes.title: bunker boy ❤️
attributes.review: our president was my idol but then 🙈 he told my mother that i didn’t love her 😔 and keyed her car 😱 he also tipped my grandfathers wheelchair over 😖 and took part in a child sex ring 😧 AND keeping literal alive children 👶 in CAGES! 😥 he’s also 5’2 😳 and ugly 😐

attributes.title: Really bad app
attributes.review: My phone now has a virus because of this app, there are many of bugs in this app please don’t fix it instead just delete the app from all app stores

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: It took about 6 hours to download and when it finally download so many ads came on different apps then my phone will lag a lot
